response.overview: Its sleepover time! Sleepovers can be a lot of fun for young girls. It's a chance to connect with other girls and stay up late sharing your innermost thoughts, desires and talk about boys. But sometimes things can get really wild as one can only imagine. Mr. and Mrs. Pistol didn't know what they were getting into when their daughter Jodi brought over her slutty friends. Seems little Kira has a daddy complex and Casey is into women - watch out mom. Brother Tyler gets into the action when he scores big with nerdy little Penny. And not to be left out - Jodi gets a surprise visitor when her college booty call arrives and fucks her in her in the bed while everybody . Oh, what a night.
response.title: The Sleep Over
